page.t: Tantive IV was a CR90 corvette in the service of the House of Organa. The ship was a central player in the events at the beginning of the Galactic Civil War, serving as Princess Leia Organa's personal starship in the leadup to the Battle of Yavin.
Chimaera was a modified Imperial I-class Star Destroyer captained by Imperial officer Thrawn during the Galactic Civil War.
Orthavan is Garm Bel Iblis's personal MC80 Liberty, armed with the best tech available to him.
Vader's personal TIE Advanced, boasting modifications commissioned by the Sith Lord.
General Grievous' personal flagship. Enhanced with many additional weapons and ion capabilities.
An ancient yet pivotal ship in the events of the Old Republic.
A powerful Harrower-class commanded by an ancient Sith during the Old Republic era.
A modified N1 with tougher hull and extremely fast engines, modified for use by the Mandalorian.
A Compellor-class battlecruiser armed with [REDACTED]'s Force-siphoning tech.
One of twelve legendary T70 X-Wings flown by Red Squadron.
The powerful experimental cruiser captained by Moff Gideon.
A Clone-era Venator from Mace Windu's personal fleet.
A powerful Republic-era Praetor with hardened hull and better construction materials.
An ancient Mandalorian Keldabe-class with better weaponry and faster engines.
Potentially the most famous ship of all time. You really need a description?
A heroic Venator-class involved in the Clone Wars.
A heroic Venator-class involved in the Clone Wars.
A heroic Venator-class involved in the Clone Wars.
A Procurator-class battlecruiser armed with [REDACTED]'s Force-siphoning tech.
A Resurgent-class battlecruiser armed with [REDACTED]'s Force-siphoning tech.
This modified Lucrehulk-class control ship served as the flagship of the Trade Federation blocade of Naboo.
A modified and improved Nebulon-B that assisted many operations for the Rebel Alliance.
A Pelta-2, and a heroic ship of the years preceding the Battle of Yavin.
The original Executor owned by Darth Vader. The leftover Sith holocrons create a gravity well effect.
An experimental TIE/es developed for Kylo Ren's personal use.
The original, namesake flagship of the Katana Fleet Dreadnaughts.
Sphyrna Hammerhead used by Rogue One to great effect.
A Sphyrna Hammerhead refitted and used by the New Republic.
A Probe Droid full of goodies!
A Victory-2 that saw great achievement in the Galactic Civil War.
A Raider-2 used by Inferno Squad during the Galactic Civil War.
A Vindicator-class that served the Empire even long after its collapse.
Four fine-tuned and enhanced TIE fighters piloted by the legendary Inferno Squadron.
The legendary Admiral Raddus' personal MC75.
A lost Mandator-III prototype abandoned to the Maw. Modified by [REDACTED]'s Force-siphon tech.
Captain-turned-Admiral Piett's Allegiance-class heavy star destroyer. Outfitted with extra battleship weapons.
A lost Titan prototype abandoned to the Maw. Modified by [REDACTED]'s Force-siphon tech.
A Bellator-class that was once part of the Byss defense fleet.
A lost Bellator prototype abandoned to the Maw. Modified by [REDACTED]'s Force-siphon tech.
The original Home One, previously owned by the legendary Giel Akbar.
An ancient, original Kandosii, unearthed from its namesake world.
A Mandator-2 stolen at the beginning of its production line and outfitted with Mandalorian weapons and tech.
An experimental Strident-class designed by NRL forward minds.
These special engines, commissioned by Bail Organa, give the Tantive a generous speed boost over standard CR90 models.
These engines were custom-tuned by the Chosen One to break speed records for the Eta-2.
These special engines create insane force to propel the Mandalorian towards his next target.
[REDACTED]'s enhancements and links to the fabric of the Force grant the Flame of Ambition unparalleled speed for its size.
Powerful engines built with advanced technology from the Dark Trooper program.
Republic-era engines tuned by an unnamed Jedi.
Who knows where exactly Han picked these up?
Engines standard to Hero Venators, as standard as a hero can be.
[REDACTED]'s enhancements and links to the fabric of the Force grant the Infinity unparalleled speed for its size.
[REDACTED]'s enhancements and links to the fabric of the Force grant the Umbra unparalleled speed for its size.
Enhanced engines for the modified Lucrehulk flagship Saak'ak.
Enhanced and modified engines for Vader's Executor.
Modified for speed by the Knights of Ren.
[REDACTED]'s enhancements and links to the fabric of the Force grant the Imperium unparalleled speed for its size.
Engines for Hero Allegiances. Possesses nearly instant travel charge.
[REDACTED]'s enhancements and links to the fabric of the Force grant the Kronos unparalleled speed for its size.
[REDACTED]'s enhancements and links to the fabric of the Force grant the Nightblade unparalleled speed for its size.
Overtuned engines manufactured by MonCal for Home One.
Ancient, lost-tech engines for the Fenelar dreadnaught.
These special shield generators, commissioned by Bail Organa, give the Tantive a generous shield boost over standard CR90 models.
Anakin's personal R2 Astromech is fine-tuned for plot armor level protection.
Thrawn's personal shield generators, modified with powerful outer-rim Chiss tech.
[REDACTED] has given the Flame of Ambition a barrier that absorbs and repurposes energy.
Custom-tuned, plot-armored astromechs unique to Red Squadron X-Wings.
Custom-tuned shields for the heroic Venators.
Han and Chewie bribed a few dozen engineers to overclock these generators.
[REDACTED] has given the Infinity a barrier that absorbs and repurposes energy.
[REDACTED] has given the Umbra a barrier that absorbs and repurposes energy.
Enhanced shields tuned for the Rebel ship Salvation.
Improved shields for the Pelta-2 Phoenix Home.
Enhanced and modified shields for Vader's Executor.
Modified for strength by the Knights of Ren.
Unified and enhanced shields for medium Heroes.
Powerful shields for the Victory-2 Protector.
Extra-layered shields for the Inferno Squadron TIEs.
[REDACTED] has given the Imperium a barrier that absorbs and repurposes energy.
Enhanced shield domes for Hero Allegiances.
[REDACTED] has given the Kronos a barrier that absorbs and repurposes energy.
[REDACTED] has given the Nightblade a barrier that absorbs and repurposes energy.
Massive, overtuned, redundant shielding for Akbar's Home One.
Powerful and ancient shields for the Fenelar dreadnaught.
These unique KX10s are tuned specifically for Red Squadron X-Wings.
Modified by The Mandalorian to possess much enhanced cooling.
Massive, oversized turrets built specifically for Endurance.
\033MForce-Siphoning laser tech reverse engineered by Umbra.
\033MForce-Siphoning laser tech reverse engineered by Umbra.
\033MForce-Siphoning laser tech reverse engineered by Umbra.
\033MForce-Siphoning laser tech reverse engineered by Umbra.

After your titanic battle with the Sith capital ship, your sensors barely managed to detect a flickering Force Essence drifting through space. Bringing it on board, you quickly discover a small core presumably once part of Umbra. It whirs to life, and within is a trapped and tortured Force spirit, sharing a namesake with the ship you just destroyed. In exchange for freeing her, she offers you a choice — she can assist you in researching either a replica of her crowning ship, or the Force-draining weaponry it utilized…
Forgotten fragments left behind by a Hero's destruction.
A new Ascendancy technology, this hyperintelligent droid core powered the mighty Mandator-3 dreadnaught. Perhaps its exotic subroutines can be repurposed...
\033RYour simplistic synapses cannot comprehend the gravity of your actions.
